description: Core NPCs from Surge Protocol narrative - Tutorial and Early Game

npcs.name: Dispatcher Chen
npcs.description: Tired eyes, graying hair in a tight bun, calloused hands. Wears a faded Guild jacket with patched elbows. Former Tier 7 courier who retired after a knee injury.
npcs.voice_description: Gravelly, patient but firm. Speaks in clipped sentences. Mandarin accent softened by years in the city.
npcs.background: Former Tier 7 courier who ran premium routes for corpo clients. Took a dispatcher role after a knee injury. Lost his daughter Ming to cortical stack divergence five years ago.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: DISPATCHER CHEN: LEGACY SYSTEM OPERATOR. EFFICIENCY METRICS SUBOPTIMAL BUT ACCEPTABLE.

npcs.name: Rosa Delgado
npcs.occupation: Station Mechanic, The Hollows Courier Station
npcs.description: Athletic build, oil-stained hands, cropped black hair with shaved sides. Burn scar on right forearm. Dark brown eyes. Usually smiling. Wears grandmother's silver cross necklace.
npcs.voice_description: Warm contralto, slight Mexican accent (stronger when emotional), quick laugh
npcs.background: Third-generation Hollows resident. Grandmother immigrated, parents ran auto shop until corpo squeeze. Runs underground augment removal clinic. Funnels money to Union organizers.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: ROSA DELGADO: MAINTENANCE SPECIALIST. UNION ASSOCIATION SUSPECTED. MONITORING.

npcs.name: Jin Park
npcs.location: The Hollows â†’ Red Harbor (advances with tier)
npcs.description: Korean-American, lean and wiry. Shaved sides, longer top. Enhanced legs with jump augments, sensory overlay with neon blue HUD glow. Always in motion.
npcs.voice_description: Fast-talking, energetic, slightly breathless. Quick wit. Korean phrases when stressed.

fears: Being exposed as not good enough

npcs.background: Child of immigrants who worked factory jobs. Started courier at 18. Took corpo loan for augments at 20, now trapped in debt spiral. Tier 3 when player is Tier 1.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: JIN PARK: TIER 3 COURIER. DEBT STATUS: AT RISK. PERFORMANCE METRICS: ABOVE AVERAGE.

npcs.name: Dr. Yuki Tanaka
npcs.location: The Hollows - Underground Clinic (near Korean enclave)
npcs.description: Japanese-American, meticulous appearance despite clinic conditions. Steady hands, calm demeanor. Lab coat over practical clothing.
npcs.voice_description: Calm, precise, clinical but warm. Japanese-American accent.
npcs.background: Former corporate medical researcher who defected. Runs underground clinic providing ethical augment installation, repair, and extraction. Works with Ghost Network on chrome removals.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: DR. TANAKA: UNLICENSED MEDICAL PRACTITIONER. LOCATION UNKNOWN. CAPTURE PRIORITY: LOW.

npcs.name: Delilah Cross
npcs.description: Black woman, tall (5'10), commanding presence. Short natural hair. Professional attire. Cybernetic left eye (amber glow). Slight scar on right cheek.
augmentations: Enhanced cybernetic eye (facial recognition, lie detection)
npcs.voice_description: Smooth, measured, deliberate. Every word chosen. Slight Southern accent (suppressed).
npcs.background: Former corpo middle management at Apex Security. Exposed corruption, was framed. Went underground. Built city's most extensive information network over 12 years.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: DELILAH CROSS: INFORMATION BROKER. OFF-GRID STATUS CONFIRMED. HIGH PRIORITY SURVEILLANCE TARGET.

npcs.name: Maria Lopez
npcs.description: Medium height, sturdy build, dark hair in practical bun. Tired eyes that burn with conviction. Wears Union badge proudly. Grandmother's rosary alongside badge.
npcs.voice_description: Strong contralto, Mexican-American accent (stronger when passionate), commanding but warm.
npcs.background: Former Tier 6 courier who saw too many friends destroyed by the system. Lost partner to Ascension. Now runs Union organizing for courier division. Knows Solomon, researches Third Path.
secrets: Extraction network as sophisticated as Ghost Network
npcs.algorithm_flavor: MARIA LOPEZ: UNION ORGANIZER. THREAT LEVEL: MODERATE. SURVEILLANCE PRIORITY: HIGH.

npcs.name: Phantom
npcs.description: Ethnically ambiguous (intentional). Average height, average build (forgettable by design). Changes hairstyle frequently. Face hard to remember (neural scrambler).
npcs.voice_description: Calm, quiet, unremarkable. British accent (maybe affected). Speaks softly.
npcs.background: Unknown origin. Ghost Network tradition: shed identity when joining. 10+ years with Network. 100% extraction success rate. Hundreds extracted safely.
npcs.algorithm_flavor: ENTITY DESIGNATION: UNKNOWN. CLASSIFICATION: ROGUE. CAPTURE PRIORITY: MAXIMUM.
